item.description:
This event is for all the entrepreneurs, small business owners, and those who want to support our own.
This meetup will be "Demo Day" event. Presenters will have 5 minutes to pitch their business and the audience will have 5 minutes to give feedback and ask questions. This is an invaluable service both to new entrepreneurs and seasoned vets. There are only six presenter slots available so do not hesitate to sign up. As spots are limited, you are committing to this event by signing up as a presenter. You must sign up here to be a presenter: http://echojune2011.e.... If you wish to only attend you can sign up via the normal meetup link.

After the event, we will head down the street to Darryl's Corner Bar & Kitchen to unwind.
item.name: Entrepreneurs of Color Helping Others (ECHO) Demo Day
